alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Lapeer; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A line of thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Lapeer, northeastern Shiawassee and northern Genesee Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 414 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Columbiaville to Mount Morris to New Lothrop. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Columbiaville and Otter Lake around 420 PM EDT. Otisville around 440 PM EDT. Crossroads Village around 450 PM EDT. Burton around 500 PM EDT. Lapeer and Davison around 505 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Juddville, Genesee and Thetford Township. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
